entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm][windows][aot] `emcc` fails to download `zlib` on rolling build, causing tests to fail #62553
  • [wasm][debugger][tests] `DebuggerTests.MiscTests.GetSourceUsingSourceLink` failing #62551
  • [Android] Out of memory crashes in System.Security.Cryptography tests #62547
  • Metadata for type 'CLASS' was not provided to the serializer, but it was. #62546
  • Check build.cmd arguments before we start doing actual work #62535
    Future
  • IHttpClientFactory cannot be injected into ILoggerProvider #62531
    Future
  • How to change the ComHost Server registry name? #62529
  • `GetSystemTimeZones()` produces different results whether `FindSystemTimeZoneById()` has been called previous or not #62527
  • Change the `cpu-usage` EventCounter from int to double #62525
  • Forward substitution for relops misses `LCL_FLD` uses #62524
    7.0.0
  • IConfiguration binding behave unexpectedly when binding empty strings from nested configurations #62532
  • Assembly.Load will throw System.IO.FileNotFoundException #62522
  • System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCache does not evict on NET 3.1/5/6 #62516
  • [Linux] procfs file reads and UnauthorizedAccessException handling #62513
  • Move corerun to src/native/hosts/ #62512
    Future
  • ChainedConfigurationProvider.GetChildKeys is inefficient #62510

Closed

  • WASM - Little/No Documentation for Using Low-Level Javascript Interop APIs #62530
  • Device unauthorized errors during Android device CI runs #47185
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Logging Source Generator - implicitly set LogLevel based on method name decorated by LoggerMessageAttribute #62412
  • [API Proposal]: `DateOnly` and `TimeOnly` `MinValue` and `MaxValue` should be fields like in `DateTime` and similar #62533
  • Can .NET 5 run exe targeting .Net Framework? #62521
  • Blazor WASM - deserialization exception with ImmutableList when the app is published #62242
  • While waiting for a TaskCompletionSource.Task, execution continues on the thread where the result was set #62523
  • System.IO errors: The process cannot access the file ... #60521
    7.0.0
  • System.Reflection.MethodInfo.CreateDelegate<T> method failing with System.ArgumentException #62366
  • CultureInfo enum #62511
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve loop JitDump output #62556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Store string-builder as a field and clear when reuse + IndexOfAny #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Pipeline caching proof of concept #62550
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • [tests] Fix local test runs for mobile #62549
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix createdump failure on MacOS Monterey version 12.0.1. #62548
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Make tests pass on AVX only host again #62544
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] View object attributes - DebugType=full #62543
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • Using ReadOnlySpan<char> on SymbolicRegexRunner #62542
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Enforce HTTP request Content-Length correctness #62541
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Removing trailing dot from a SNI host in TLS #62540
    area-System.Net.Security
  • More regex source generator tweaks #62539
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Backport all CI matrix changes from 7.0 to reelase/6.0 #62538
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Disable test BasicTestWithMcj for CG2 with #60381 #62537
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Introduce automation rules for PR workflows #62534
    area-Infrastructure
  • Dedup addprefix & delete unused defines from cmake #62528
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-maui] Backport MacCatalyst process start support #62520
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Don't create multiple large files at the same time #62519
    area-System.IO, test enhancement
  • Skip source gen DLLs in mono AOT #62518

Merged

  • Update build pool to macOS 11 #62294
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable tests on Mac Catalyst in App Sandbox mode #62536
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] `gtHasRef` refactoring #62526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Integration of changes in shared files from runtimelab/NativeAOT #62515
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Enable memory-mapped stress log on cross platform #61123
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix createdump failure on MacOS Monterey version 12.0.1 #62465
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: refactor arm64 epilog generation #62381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `gtEvalSizeFirst` #62330
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Port changes from 6.0 for future servicing releases into main #62469
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.2 #62493
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 5.0.14 #62492
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix: add openSUSE 15.2 - second attempt #60161
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Mark static boxes as invariant #62298
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Fix and optimize llvmonly+gsharedvt code generation #61117
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Optimize ReadOnlyTernaryTree for System.Private.Xml #60076
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • S.IO.StringReader: Use ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfAny in ReadLine() for performance #60463
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] View object attributes - DebugType=full #62278
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Unblock tests in LINQ interpreter only mode #62463
    area-System.Dynamic.Runtime
  • Enable max warnlevel from C# compiler #62506
  • Convert TryGetRawMetadata comment to XML documentation #61515
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Disable DispatchProxyTests.Test_Unloadability on Mono #62504
    area-System.Reflection
  • Add Runtime portion of android startup scenario #61861

Updated

  • Convert some old style intrinsics to NamedIntrinsic #62271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use "pipeline-caching" for coreclr and libraries builds #62464
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • PE loader/image investigations #61938
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 #61934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch over miscellaneous DllImports to GeneratedDllImport. #62353
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add almalinux support #62184
    area-Host
  • Escape lower-cased type names #62507
    area-Meta
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [build] Create clr.host subset to remove patching step for mono runtime tests #62500
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix AddEventLog: EventLogSettings not added #57567
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, Future
  • Fix XmlSchema does not correctly validate xs:NMTOKENS type restrictions with enumeration #60544
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • CI matrix update: add Ubuntu 21.04 - second attempt #60162
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
    blocked, area-Infrastructure
  • Mark overflow fix for regions #60646
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
  • [wasm] Reduce number of calls to setTimer #62433
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 6.0.x
  • Add Match and isMatch ReadOnlySpan<char> overloads as well as Regex protected methods which expose ReadOnlySpan<char> to avoid allocations. #62509
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] Fix re-initialization of hash objects on CNG. #62403
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • Fix a case of hang while allocating at LOH boundary #62355
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Initial changes for emscripten 2.0.34 #62499
    area-Build-mono
  • Add RegexGenerator to System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter. #62325
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use await on task when waiting for tests to complete #62501
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Support for devirtualizing array interface methods #62497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
    area-Infrastructure
  • CI matrix: Add windows 20H2 - fix TLS1.3 issue #62435
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add zlib-ng library, optimized for ARM64 #61883
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntity #61774
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Add ConstantExpectedAttribute #62436
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Rewrite XslNumber.ConvertToDecimal #55868
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Improve inliner - static readonly fields, pinvokes, Span::Length #62421
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP]: Fix broken callstacks in interpreter on MonoVM. #60338
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use SIMD operations in InitBlkUnroll/CopyBlkUnroll and increase unroll limit up to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Reenable Mono runtime tests on PRs #62437
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • HTTP/3: QPACK decoder performance #62470
    area-System.Net.Http

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • We need a better doc on creating dev environments on Arm64 machines #22963
  • dotnet format reports false positive for CS1503 #22961
  • Enhance the call to action of the UnsupportedTargetFrameworkVersion error for users #22959
  • dotnet publish hangs in Windows for ~10min after completion #22948

Closed

  • Using Remove in Directory.Build.props is ignored #22515
  • Dotnet CLI replaces symbols in clear text password for authorized nuget feeds #22955

PullRequests

Created

  • Update application insights version #22974
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge pull request #22947 from dotnet/marcpopMSFT-macosleg #22971

  • Merge pull request #22947 from dotnet/marcpopMSFT-macosleg #22970
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge pull request #22947 from dotnet/marcpopMSFT-macosleg #22969

  • Merge pull request #22947 from dotnet/marcpopMSFT-macosleg #22968
    Area-Infrastructure

  • Switch to Ubuntu 1804 (5.0.4xx) #22965
  • Skip adding build configurations for shared projects #22954
    Area-CLI

Merged

  • Remove AoT Build Publish Args To Prevent Un-necessary Uploads #22967
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve error message for path mismatch #22919
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update macos leg to 1015 #22947
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge 6.0.1xx into the 6.0.2xx branch to catch it up to current #22861
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove AoT `Publish Test Results` Step #22946
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.102 #22940
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update .vsts-ci-richnav.yml #22916
    Area-Infrastructure
  • upgrade ubuntu version #22879
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 7.0.1xx
  • Unskip Blazor Integration Tests #22945
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Handle the case when procfs is inaccessible #22927
    Area-Infrastructure
  • include props and targets for code style packages #22918
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MacOS Failure to Restore with signature validation issue #58202
    17.1
  • Incorrect nullability warnings reported for compound assignments with lifted struct operators #58201
  • InitializeToolset flakiness in correctness builds #58199
    17.1
  • Failing expression compiler tests involving async lambdas #58198
  • NuGet.Protocol.Core.Types.FatalProtocolException exception in helix work items #58197
    17.1
  • Decompiler does not decode some assemblies... #58192
  • FindAllReferences on Length property or Slice method misses usages in list-patterns #58190
    17.1
  • Compile as .netmodule fails, but exe is working #58193
  • Move away from binary trees in regex parser #58186
    Backlog

Closed

  • TestGetAsyncEnumeratorPatternOnRange is flaky #58196
  • "IDE0004 C# Cast is redundant" is reported incorrectly for default #49954
    Backlog
  • *.resources FileNotFoundException, this is nonsense. #58155
  • Weird nullable detection #58187
  • Redundant cast is not redundant! #54388
    Backlog
  • C# compiler casting bug (erroneous CS0675) #42816
  • switch expression casting from/to enum and ushort suggests invalid fix in VS 2019 16..4.0 Preview 5.0 #40167
    Backlog
  • IDE cannot make up it’s mind: cast is necessary or unnecessary for nullable reference? #33285
    Backlog
  • False positive "Cast is redundant" #37041
    Backlog
  • IDE wrongly reports "Cast is Redundant" for an implicit conversion #36782
    Backlog
  • Incorrect cast is redundant in switch expression with nullable value type. #36755
    Backlog
  • Incorrect "Cast is redundant" when negating Int32-typecast-to-Int64 #34553
    Backlog
  • false positive redundant cast #32773
    Backlog
  • VS shows cast to (ulong) as reduncant when its not #31303
    Backlog
  • Conflicting errors when casting between Func/Action and Delegate #25165
    Backlog
  • Incorrect IDE004 "Cast is redundant" hint #11008
    Backlog
  • Incorrect ID0004 - when constructing a ValueTuple which is then assigned to object #33143
    Backlog
  • IDE0004 False positive #33043
    Backlog
  • Incorrect IDE0004 (Cast is redundant) in sign extended operations #20617
    Backlog
  • Incorrect "Cast is redundant" for constant patterns where the constant is an explicit cast from a numeric literal #45925
    Backlog
  • Incorrect IDE0004 in iterator #37473
    Backlog
  • IDE0004 incorrectly suggested for method with nullable result and conditional operator with default result #34509
    Backlog
  • check other calls for Incorrect IDE0004 "Cast is redundant" - https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/32467 #33176
    Backlog
  • IDE0004 reported incorrectly for a delegate cast #58171
  • Incorrect IDE0004: Remove unnecessary cast #58095
  • IDE0004: Cast is redundant not true when removing nullable for returning a value. #49690
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Integration test MetadataReference #58204
    Area-IDE
  • Update several ExpressionCompiler unit tests for inferred delegate types #58203
    Area-Interactive
  • Add and implement `IImplicitIndexerReferenceOperation` #58200
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range
  • Respond to changes in project context to support w/out navbar and mul… #58195
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Find unit test assemblies whose names differ from the project directory name #58194
    Area-Infrastructure
  • use same defaults for naming style as ship with the dotnet sdk #58185
    Area-IDE
  • Merges/main to features/param nullchecking #58183
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Parameter null-checking analyzer and fixer #58182
    Area-Analyzers

Merged

  • BoundDecisionDag.Rewrite - Avoid capturing the replacement map #58137
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Add regex parser tests #58184
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add test demonstrating issue does not repro. #58178
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58181
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58180
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #58205
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Simplify lazy initialization in RazorDocumentServiceProviderWrapper #58063
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58069
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use ElasticSpace instead of ElasticZeroSpace #58152
    Area-IDE
  • Use interpolated string handler for Contract.ThrowIf methods #58173
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Avoid calculating inferred delegate type unnecessarily in conversions and type inference #58115
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Analyzers to 3.3.3 #58154
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Method group conversion caching redo #57882
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update instructions for building runtime repo #58172
    Area-Compilers, Documentation

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ErrorBoundary not working as expected #38905
  • IDistributedCache - return "RedisServerException: WRONGTYPE Operation against a key holding the wrong kind of value" #38904
  • [Feature Request] Invite Only Registration #38902
    Backlog
  • Building package.json with ClientAssets results in 404 Not Found #38898
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Node.js processes *still* don't quit after stopping debugging #38897
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Add possibility to customize `Server` response header in `KestrelServerOptions` #38895
  • Better way to detect "Failed to start the HttpConnection before stop() was called." #38893
  • Upgrading from 5.0 to 6.0 yields InvalidOperationException: Cannot find compilation library location for package 'System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs #38892
  • How to get the domain name of my site in ASP.NET Core 3.1 before the request in Program.cs #38891
    Discussions
  • CSS isolation does not work when Razor runtime compilation is enabled #38889
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor wasm hot reload refresh server only accessible at ws:// in Visual Studio #38888
  • The purpose to add `app.UseAuthorization()` middleware when using a default template to create a none-Authentication application #38887
  • Configure existing HttpClient using WebApplicationFactory (e.g. for named clients using IServiceCollection.AddHttpClient<T>) #38883
  • Duplicating Router.AppAssembly in AdditionalAssemblies causes confusing error #38882
    Backlog

Closed

  • Windows Service does not take settings from appsettings.json #38870
  • Opening and closing port at runtime #38885
  • Configurable Reconnection Behavior #38305
    Backlog
  • Prerendering Blazor WASM .NET 5 app with authentication throws error #28025
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ASP.Net 6 Namespace issue #38204
  • .NET 6 - Blazor Server Side: RemoteJSDataStream NullReferenceException BUG #38854
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #38873
  • Blazor app fails to run with JS error "Failed to invoke 'StartCircuit' due to an error on the server" #38859
  • Issues with RegEx behaviour in .NET 5 #38894
  • Perf regression: caching, multiple_queries #38874
  • dotnet watch run not work properly (net core 6) #38845

PullRequests

Created

  • Prevent SignalR Hub from being cached from CDN on LongPolling #38901
    area-signalr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Kestrel HTTP 1/1: Set 'Connection: close' header when produces 413 Payload too large #38884
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove unnecessary unicode control characters #38900
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http: Decorate priorFeature as nullable on StreamResponseBodyFeature ctor #38875
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Turn off parallelization on new long iis tests #38881
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Avoid sending a PR if there's already one open #38880
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • HTTP/2: Improve incoming header performance #38834
    area-runtime
  • Fix RedisCache update that breaks usage against older redis servers #38860
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add support for GitHub Codespaces prebuilds #38793
    area-infrastructure
  • API doc updates #38852
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Using DictionaryKeyPolicy during ProblemDetails.Errors conversion to JSON #38853
    area-mvc
  • Added ResourcesAssembly property to LocalizationOptions to set different Assembly for localization resources. #28972
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Enable template localization on dotnet CLI #38867
    area-infrastructure
  • Support overriding AuthorizeFilter.OnAuthorizationAsync(context) in more cases #38851
    area-mvc
  • Port of Bootstrap v4 SxS support to 7.0 #38865
    area-identity

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Image CornerRadius #3707
  • Add IsVisible Property to ToolbarItem #3701
  • Flyout works on Windows but not mobile devices #3700
  • The status page does not tell you what version it's talking about #3699
  • Creating a Page using a DataTemplate does not support Dependency Injection #3698
  • Blazor startup errors for duplicate routes is hard to discover and debug #3695

Closed

  • BlazorWebView on MAUI Android doesn't use custom file provider override #3676
  • Blazor Desktop navigation #2533
  • Dependency injection of ILogger not working when using Serilog in Maui Blazor app [Bug] #3031
  • [Bug] wwwroot is not included when using blazor + WPF + MSIX for Windows Store #3275
  • [Bug] MAUI Blazor - Router AppAssembly could not find pages if assembly is different #3258

PullRequests

Created

  • iOS: Load fonts from filename instead of NSData in CGDataProvider #3696
    area/fonts 🅰️

Merged

  • Add BlazorWebView device tests and fix Android file provider bug #3612
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Close stream instead of dispose and fix unit test #3705
  • Fix publishing WPF/WinForms Blazor apps with MSIX #3582
    area/blazor 🕸️, feature-blazor-windesktop, feature-blazor-sdk
  • Disable Interpreter for templates #3680
    do-not-merge
  • [p11] iOS: Load fonts from filename instead of NSData in CGDataProvider #3697

Updated

  • [android] reduce JNI calls by moving logic into Java #3372
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Window extend toolbar #3693
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Return a blank Label when LoadTemplate is null to prevent Hot Reload crashes #3692
  • Added dependency resolution with DataTemplate and Shell global routes… #3375
    community ✨
  • Implement CursorPosition in IEditor/ITextInput Handlers #3196
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Async Cancellation For WebView #3681
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix ProjectReference for Controls targeting/runtime pack projects #3689
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄
  • Add FormattedText property support to Label in Controls #3637
    area/controls 🎮

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate time-to-first-query and per-query in Blazor WASM with Sqlite #26949
  • Migrating from .NET5 to .NET6 throws PlatformNotSupported_DataSqlClient exception on startup in linux #26948
  • EF Core Migration Bundles: no way to passthrough custom args to generated efbundle #26945
  • Better translation for COUNT with predicate checking for non-null #26940
  • Count over column projection after GroupBy yields wrong results #26938
  • New entity is not saved under certain conditions #26937

Closed

  • Where_TimeOnly_subtract_TimeOnly using TimeOnlyTypeMapping for TimeSpan constant #26864
  • Unexpected slow response #26944
  • Code inheritance without database inheritance #26741
  • EF generates invalid SQL when using enums in projections #26472
    7.0.0
  • Incorrect query generated when using Skip and Enum Where condition when Skip value is same as enum value #22524
    7.0.0
  • Query: Deal with same querycontext parameter having multiple inferred type mapping #19503
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Static analysis: make members static #26947
  • Static analysis: minor small changes #26946
  • [6.0.2] Call sync connection close instead of async #26943
  • Call sync connection close instead of async (7.0) #26942
  • Add regression tests for Count after GroupBy #26939
  • SQL row value comparison syntax #26936
  • Temporal table support for owned and table splitting scenarios #26935

Merged

  • Static analysis: remove redundant nullable warning suppression #26941
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #26933
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26932
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #26931
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Query: Add multiple parameters if inferred type mapping differs #26582
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Fixup navigations to/from join entity when new many-to-many relationship is created #26853
  • [6.0.2] Query: Defer inline-ing owned navigation expansion till all joins are generated #26617
    Servicing-consider

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 6.0.2xx SDK, validation-installer-.NET 6.0.2xx SDK #installer-119839-.NET6.0.2xxSDK #12746
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main validation-installer-.NET Core SDK 3.1.4xx, installer, .NET Core SDK 3.1.4xx #installer-113806-.NETCoreSDK3.1.4xx #12329
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-installer-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #installer-110743-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #12112
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 2, validation-installer-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 2 #installer-110409-.NET6.0.1xxSDKRC2 #12089
  • Build_LinuxPortable_Release_x64 leg consistently failing PR validation in release/6.0.1xx #12575

PullRequests

Created

  • Update to ubuntu 18.04 #12776
  • Update to ubuntu 18.04 #12775

Merged

  • Update branding to 5.0.211 #12759
  • Update branding to 5.0.405 #12760

Updated
